alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Gulf, east central Bay and southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 530 PM EDT/430 PM CDT/... At 455 PM EDT/355 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Callaway. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stonemill Creek, Wewahitchka, Nixon, Youngstown, Cairo, Kinard, Broad Branch, Chipola Park, Majette and Saunders. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf
